hero.title: Privacy Policy
hero.description: Learn how we protect and use your personal data in accordance with GDPR

introduction.title: Introduction
introduction.content: Viridial is committed to protecting your privacy and personal data. This privacy policy explains how we collect, use, store, and protect your information in accordance with the General Data Protection Regulation (GDPR).

dataCollection.title: Data Collection
dataCollection.content: We collect the following data to provide and improve our services:

items.name: Name and contact information (name, email address, phone number)

dataSecurity.title: Data Security
dataSecurity.content: We use advanced technical and organizational security measures to protect your data, including SSL/TLS encryption, regular backups, and restricted access to personal data. Your data is stored in certified and secure data centers.

yourRights.title: Your Rights
yourRights.content: In accordance with GDPR, you have the following rights:

items.access: Right of access to your personal data
items.rectification: Right to rectification of inaccurate data
items.deletion: Right to erasure (right to be forgotten)

contact: For any questions regarding this policy, contact us at privacy@viridial.com
